name: coding-interview-server
description: Backend server for real-time coding interview platform

scripts.migrate: node -e "import('pg').then(async ({default: pg}) => { const client = new pg.Client({connectionString: process.env.DATABASE_URL || 'postgresql://devuser:devpass@localhost:5432/coding_interview'}); await client.connect(); const sql = require('fs').readFileSync('./database/migrations/001_initial_schema.sql', 'utf8'); await client.query(sql); await client.end(); console.log('Migration complete'); })"
